teammembers.bio: Just Right's CFO still follows what his father told him, 'Perfection or Nothing'.

teammembers.name: Ouseph Abraham

teammembers.bio: Well... looks like more hands are needed to do paperworks!

teammembers.bio: Since him joining the team, the sales are skyrocketing. Wonder what he does?

teammembers.name: Logan Wolvy

teammembers.bio: He was the one who came up with the idea of free 8up's with each sale.

teammembers.name: Michael Scott
teammembers.title: Chief Sales Officer
teammembers.bio: After the resignation from Dunder Mifflin, he is always here.

teammembers.name: Pam Anderson

teammembers.bio: Who doesn't love a welcoming smile?

teammembers.bio: Doesn't know what's he doing, but hey, everyone counts!

teammembers.bio: Everyone wants some music for their souls!
